mamba create -n ct_viewer python=3.10

mamba install colorcet h5py numpy pandas numba scipy quaternionic matplotlib openpyxl xlsxwriter

# Check cuda version using nvcc --version first
# This will only work if cudatoolkit was manually installed. 
mamba install cupy=12.2.0 cuda-version=<VERSION>
# VERSION is 11.8 on most machines, it's 11.7 on Zemo. 


pip install dearpygui

cd /home/pboyle/Dropbox/Code/Python/medical_physics/ct_viewer/dist

pip install --no-deps --no-build-isolation ct_viewer-0.1.0-py3-none-any.whl

# To build:
# Navigate to Code\Python\medical_physics\ct_viewer
python -m build
